hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Huraira:The Prophet (ﷺ) never criticized any food (he was invited to) but he used to eat if he liked the food, and leave it if he disliked it

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا عَابَ النَّبِيُّ صلى الله عليه وسلم طَعَامًا
chapter.eng-name: The Prophet (ﷺ) never criticized any food.
